Each treatment randomize one six designated location either upper arm location , low upper back , within subject . The treatment reapplied location subsequent day . Each treatment apply daily 2 day Part 1 , daily 21 day Part 2 . In Part 3 , patient apply thin coat one two concentration GSK1940029 gel vehicle acne affect facial/neck skin hand , daily 28 day .
